dct_title_s: Nouveau plan de Paris : avec les augmentations et changemens qui on été faits pour son embellissement
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Insets: Plan de Versailles (scale [1:40,000]) -- Banlieue de Paris (scale not given). Includes indices on left, right, and lower margins. Historiated title cartouche. Boutier suggests "Tulpin G. Viguet" as name of sculpsit, cf. 325. Wall map. Historic Maps copy 1 has cloth loops for hanging in upper corners.
